bio:
International keynote speaker, CEO and award-winning digital storyteller with 10+ years of experience leading social media strategy for global brands including LinkedIn, Winn-Dixie, Save-A-Lot and BMC Software. Featured in CNNMoney, Harvard Business Review, Inc., Entrepreneur, and Social Media Examiner.
|
shortsummary:International keynote speaker, CEO and award-winning digital storyteller with 10+ years of experience leading social media strategy for brands including LinkedIn, Winn-Dixie, Save-A-Lot and BMC Software. Featured in CNNMoney, Harvard Business Review, Inc., Entrepreneur, and Social Media Examiner.
title: Award-winning digital storyteller and bestselling author with 10+ years of experience leading social media strategy for global brands including LinkedIn.
